column5: What a cutey.  He's, uh, got your feet.  Maybe our dudes will fish together in the future?
my god, it's a boy looks like a tripod
Good deal.  He'll be fishing with you in no time.

Made a visit to Kitchener this afternoon to have our 3d/4d ultrasound.  The little guy looked great, despite his unwillingness to show his entire face.  It was pretty amazing seeing the video of him moving around!  He is 27 weeks old, and around 2-3 pounds right now!
Those ultrasounds are very cool! Congrats, and hope everything goes smoothly for you guys!
That's cool Clive, my mom just looked at it and boy have they come a long way in the last 40 odd year  Maureen
congrats !! Wow wonder if I could borrow that machine  for checking out my fishing spots

Wow...amazing...truly amazing.  We had the standard ultrasounds, but these are incredible to see!  Thanks for sharing....brings back memories for sure (no, not my memories....memories of seeing my daughter...LOL)
Wow... incredible... congrats
Wow, those are really neat.  Amazing, thanks.  Joey
Pretty cool pics.  Congrats.  007
Awesome Clive.  I had the same thing done with my youngest. 3D pics and video of the entire ultrasound on cd.
Wow congrats a new little fishin buddy in the making. Very nice.
thats awesome man!  its going to be a rush!  Cheers!
very cool Clive, hope the next few weeks go well for you and Gillian.
Amazing technology I can't believe the detail it looks like you are looking through a window.Thanks for sharing the pics with us.  MTP
Yes it's really cool Clive. The detail is amazing. Hope you are getting the video that goes along with it.  John..
Pretty cool pictures, congrat's!
That is amazing! All the best to you and Gillian and your little fella in the next couple months. Thanks for sharing.  Cheers, 1leg
Thats amazing,and all the best to you and your wife,when i first read this I thought it was a new technology advance for fish finders lol,again Congrats Brian
We've had them with all our boys, and the pics really are amazing!  Congrats, and I hope these last few weeks go good.....  dk
Good deal Clive, glad to here everything is well.  Whopper
Congrats man.
Clive, congrats to you and Gillian. This is probably the most spectacular event that happens in one's life. Beautiful!
I can feel the excitement in your post! Congrats to you and your family... get your sleep while you can! HH

Cool!  The UCBaby experience was so great we went back for a 2nd time, but it was unfortunately too late and the baby was too big by that point.  I spent some time wondering about the technology, I think it is computerized rendering of normal 2D ultrasound readouts, but who knows.  In any case, when my girl was born, she looked just like she did in the 3D ultrasound so I'm pretty sure the technology works.  Best wishes for a safe delivery!  The best part of your life is about to begin.  Charles
Very cool pics!    Congrats!

That is absolutely amazing Clive, congratulations. It ALMOST makes me want to start a family of our own, but I think I'll check back with you in about a year, lol!  It was nice meeting you up in Red Lake as well!
